name: Square Knight (ArcZ)
description:
Lore:
Darker is the world, existance is not allowed, the last one reamins, his sword and shield are the only light in this world

Gameplay:

enter a dark world where the only thing left is you, your sword and shield, survive as long as possible, but be careful, the enemies lurk more and more

Game includes:

3 tracks
Tutorial included
2 types of enemy (ranged and melee)
2 weapons (sword and shield)

New Features:

V.1.1
Added 1 enemy (Explosive)
Increasing spawn enemy... decreased.
Added version label on Main Menu.

V.1.2
Added a pause menu
Increasing spawn enemy slightly increased
Added a volume control
Added a Personal HighScore
